alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GENEVA... NORTHEASTERN WALTON...WESTERN HOLMES AND NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Geneva. The storm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, De Funiak Springs, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Gaskin, Cerrogordo, Lytle, Darlington, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Geneva Municipal A/P, Glendale, Millers Ferry, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, and Hickory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
